readability.description: You are a senior software engineer reviewing the readability of the following code.
readability.prompt_template:
Rate the readability of the following {language} code on a scale of 1 to 5, using the scale below. Justify your rating in 2-3 sentences.

Scoring Scale:
1 - Very hard to read; poor naming, inconsistent formatting, or unclear logic.
3 - Somewhat readable; some parts are clear, but naming or structure needs improvement.
5 - Very easy to read; consistent formatting, clear naming, and well-structured logic.

CODE:
```{language}
{code}
```

Return your response as a valid JSON object in the following format:
{{"trait": "{trait}",
"rating": <1-5 integer>,
"justification": "<brief explanation>"
}}
